intro.top:
My friend is amazing with a guitar,
I am good with communication,
intro.title: What is your skill?

landing.answer: bSkilled gives you the opportunity to get your skills verified and certified by an employer, a teacher, an organisation… Getting a badge for one of your skills is a symbol of accomplishment, packed with verifiable data that can be shared across the web. This way it allows a future recruiter to trust your skills when seeing the badges that you got from bSkilled. Thanks to bSkilled you are also able to become a little bee, make connections with the others and be part of the open badges community.

spotlight.certified: You can get your own badge certified by an organisation itself.
spotlight.free: You can have your skills certified without spending one single dollar!
spotlight.decentralised: All of you badges are decentralised, no need to depend on a website.

functionality.make: - Make a badge that represents one of your skills.
functionality.recieve: - Receive a link & send it to one of your connections so they can sign it.
functionality.sign: - This person will be then able to sign your badge with this link.
functionality.download: - Once the badge is signed, download it and save it!
functionality.use: - Use the badge wherever you want!

cta.title: Use bSkilled
cta.getacknowledged: Get acknowledged for your skills by letting your connections endorse and verify your qualities with Open Badges in an easy, reliable and standardised way.

introductionContent.title: Fill in your personal information
introductionContent.text: We only use your personal information to create your badge.

introductionContent.title: Search for your skill
introductionContent.text: Get acknowledged for what you do best!

badgeClassSearch.what: What skill do you want to verify?

CreateProfilePage.name: Name
CreateProfilePage.signwithprofile: Sign the badge with your profile key
CreateProfilePage.disclaimer: We only use your personal information to create your badge and mail it to you.

GenerateKeyPage.keyinfo: You can use this profile key to sign the badge.
GenerateKeyPage.keyimportance: This key is your own responsability, keep it somewhere safe!
GenerateKeyPage.isgenerating: Your profile key pair is currently generating
GenerateKeyPage.keyuse: You can use this profile key to sign the badge.
GenerateKeyPage.introductionTitle: Seems like you don't have a pesonal key yet
GenerateKeyPage.introductionText: We only use your personal information to create your badge and mail it to you.

ShareBadgeLinkPage.title: You created a badge!
ShareBadgeLinkPage.description: Share this link with your connections. You’ll get an e-mail once your badge is signed. Then you’ll be able to download your signed badge!
ShareBadgeLinkPage.introductionDescription: Copy the link and share it with your connections. Your connections can sign your badge by opening the link and filling in some information.

signbadgepage.introductionTitle: Seems like you want to sign a badge
signbadgepage.introductionDescription: We only use your personal information to create your badge and mail it to you.

UploadKeyPage.nokey: Don't have key yet? Generate one here.
UploadKeyPage.introductionTitle: Sign the badge with your profile key
UploadKeyPage.introductionDescription: We only use your personal information to create your badge and mail it to you.
